content:
Outlets in the Charles Wilson Building https://www2.le.ac.uk daily 1 2006-02-14T08:00:00Z 1st Floor https://www2.le.ac.uk/offices/catering/Outlets/charles-wilson-building/1st-floor Monday - Friday

City Side ~ 11.45am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 2.00pm
Food is served until 2:00pm

A cafeteria style self service eatery, food is ready made to reduce waiting time. On offer are a choice of hot meals (including a vegetarian option), soups, sandwiches and salads as well as a quiet place to relax and enjoy the view. Our new menu also includes many gluten free options. Menus rotate on a weekly basis and can be viewed here.

Monday - Friday

Park Side Bar ~ 9.15am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 2.30pm

Park Side Restaurant ~ 12pm \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 2pm (last food orders 1.30pm)

The Park Side of the 1st Floor houses a stylish, contemporary restaurant which offers restaurant service with the option of booking for private events. Menus rotate on a weekly basis and can be viewed here. A breakfast menu is provided via the bar area from 9.15am to 11am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd perfect for early meetings!

The Park Side can be booked by contacting cateringreservations@le.ac.uk or 0116 252 2212

Please note: The 1st Floor is only open to staff, visitors and postgraduate students.

]]> No publisher jm391 Catering - Outlets - Charles Wilson Building 2012-02-02T16:45:00Z Blog Entry chi https://www2.le.ac.uk/offices/catering/Outlets/charles-wilson-building/chi Monday - Friday

Term-Time 8.00am ~ 3.00pm
Food is served until 2:30pm

Vacation 8:00am ~ 2.30pm
Food is served until 2:00pm

chi is a contemporary caf\ufffd\ufffd restaurant with an international theme. Offering a fabulous fusion of tastes from Asian style street food to traditional English choices, chi favourites include Malaysian Ginger Beef, Thai Vegetable Curry, Chicken Wraps, and the always popular All Day Breakfast. We also offer a burger meal deal in chi which our students love.

]]> No publisher jm391 Catering - Outlets - Charles Wilson Building 2011-12-22T16:55:00Z Blog Entry delic!ous https://www2.le.ac.uk/offices/catering/Outlets/charles-wilson-building/delic-ous Monday - Friday

Term Time 8.00am ~ 7.00pm
Deli Bar - food is served until 3:00pm

Vacation 8.00am ~ 6.00pm
Deli Bar - food is served until 2:30pm

delic!ous is a one stop shop for your every need. A deli style sandwich and baguette bar, self service salad bar, hot pastries, soups, pre-made salads, pasta pots, cook at home meals, confectionery, a large selection of hot and cold drinks, newspapers, hampers,\ufffd\ufffdgroceries, gifts, cards - delic!ous has it all! Leicester recently became the first university in the UK to receive accreditation from Coeliac UK, and you can find many gluten-free products in delic!ous.

Need a last minute gift? Pop into delic!ous and pick up a pre-made hamper or create your own from products in store with help from our friendly staff.
